channel.title: EverGreenScape
channel.description:
Hello All, I am here to advertise a brand new server called EverGreenscape.
Server will be 40x exp rate and will only drop rares when we hit a certain number of people. We do not want to flood server with rares and will only drop to player/rare ratio. We will be hiring staff after a certain amount of time, we are not into just asking friends to do it and then have them abuse it, we want a good fair server that everyone can enjoy. There will be alot more updates added in next few days but i will be releasing this now for you to enjoy. The exp rate will be dropped to 25x once everyone has settled. Here are a few screenshots and a list of what we have done so far. Oh yes i nearly forgot we will be adding a new Event arena and sub island which you will be able to earn privilage to go on without paying a single penny. We still need to think of some ways of people earning. We also will be adding a pk island! Game download and website is in my sig!
-Blue Dragons at alter with a spear wall around them. -Rock of ages with Blue Dragons. -Shield Mender at back of Edgebank -Mithrel seeds work -Can put cannon together now -Need certain amount of quest points for champions guild -Admin can promote ingame -Staff can teleport to towns like ::teleport edgeville -command ::npctalk makes npctalks -::wild command says if wild is inactive or active -Nearly every skill has been editted so multplyer is correct -Implemented magic pools - added runecraft codes just need to add to skill menu will be done in next day or so - added rats to the castle
[IMG]http://i435.photobucket.com/albums/qq79/SegaGameGear/screenshot4ob.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i435.photobucket.com/albums/qq79/SegaGameGear/screenshot3e.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i435.photobucket.com/albums/qq79/SegaGameGear/screenshot0xd.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i435.photobucket.com/albums/qq79/SegaGameGear/screenshot18l-1.png[/img]
download/forums in my sig!

item.title: EverGreenScape
item.dc:creator: @pompio pompio
item.description:
@pompio wrote:

[quote=“EverGreenScape, post:42, topic:340819”][quote author=pompio link=topic=437204.msg3227916#msg3227916 date=1275773596]

Why did you copy and paste what was wrote when this was first made? There won’t be any updates because you cannot even do xml…

Also could you remove them screenshots since they are not yours and have my name in it. I have nothing to do with your server.

i NEVER wanted you to even be apart of my server, i just wanted to make a simple server for players to play. And whats so bad about a friend helping another friend take screenshots?

That is why i am not part of it? I am not your friend? Your a dickhead and i do not like you. I do not consider people like that my friend. I am guessing you do not even know how to take screenshots if you have to use my screenshots…
[/quote]
ofcourse i do, but if u already took em, whats the point of making new ones? and how am i the dickhead if u just ditched me… Yeah i dont know bs for coding but u didnt have to fucking join me[/quote]

How did i ditch you i did everything you wanted on your game and then sent you source…

Like i said idc you using it because i did it for you but your just being a dick. I wanted my pics removed because i am not part of that server… So could you remove ?

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“OldSkoolRSC, post:26, topic:340819”][quote author=pompio link=topic=437204.msg3216042#msg3216042 date=1274668429]
server is back up was down for 20 mins or so because we were sorting some website stuff out
[/quote]

no1 cares fool stop ignoring the question, what is so different about ur server that would make players quit thier server and join urs?[/quote]

We will be adding in clan system and also we will be adding in new custom quests for other people. We are generally working on everything to try cater everyone. I do not see any reason for you to be rude. You guys can be locking this topic if you want because we have changed name of server and will be making a new topic.

Thank-You
